content.en: CORDIC algorithm enhancements: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the efficiency and performance of the CORDIC algorithm, which is commonly used in various applications. They have proposed modifications and enhancements to the algorithm to address limitations such as the range of convergence, scaling, and circuit construction. These improvements involve incorporating additional iterative equations, changing the radix of computation, precomputing rotation directions, and adopting adaptive recoding methods. The goal is to reduce latency, improve area and power consumption, and achieve higher accuracy and throughput in applications such as signal processing and computing Nth root.
content.da: Forbedringer af CORDIC-algoritmen: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen af CORDIC-algoritmen, som ofte anvendes i forskellige applikationer. De har foreslået modifikationer og forbedringer af algoritmen for at tackle begrænsninger som konvergensområdet, skalering og konstruktion af kredsløb. Disse forbedringer involverer inkorporering af yderligere iterative ligninger, ændring af beregningens radiks, forkalkulering af rotationsretninger og anvendelse af adaptive omkodningsmetoder. Målet er at reducere latenstid, forbedre areal- og strømforbrug samt opnå højere nøjagtighed og gennemløb i applikationer som signalbehandling og beregning af den N. rod.
